mapper.sql: no, courseNo, DATE_FORMAT(releaseDate, "%Y/%m/%d") as releaseDate_v, releaseFlg, case releaseFlg when '0' then '暂存' when '1' then '发布' when '2' then '关闭' end as releaseFlg_v, courseName,coursePic, addTimestamp, addUserKey, updTimestamp, updUserKey, updPgmId
mapper.insert: insert into t_course_info (no, courseNo, releaseDate, releaseFlg, courseName,coursePic, addTimestamp, addUserKey, updTimestamp, updUserKey, updPgmId, courseDetails) values (#{no,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{courseno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releasedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{releaseflg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{coursename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coursepic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updpgmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coursedetails,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_course_info
courseNo = #{courseno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
releaseDate = #{releasedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
releaseFlg = #{releaseflg,jdbcType=CHAR},
courseName = #{coursename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coursePic = #{coursepic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addTimestamp = #{addtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
addUserKey = #{adduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updTimestamp = #{updtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updUserKey = #{upduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updPgmId = #{updpgmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
courseDetails = #{coursedetails,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where courseNo = #{courseno,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_course_info set courseNo = #{courseno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, releaseDate = #{releasedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, releaseFlg = #{releaseflg,jdbcType=CHAR}, courseName = #{coursename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addTimestamp = #{addtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, addUserKey = #{adduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updTimestamp = #{updtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updUserKey = #{upduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updPgmId = #{updpgmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, courseDetails = #{coursedetails,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where no = #{no,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_course_info set courseNo = #{courseno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, releaseDate = #{releasedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, releaseFlg = #{releaseflg,jdbcType=CHAR}, courseName = #{coursename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addTimestamp = #{addtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, addUserKey = #{adduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updTimestamp = #{updtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updUserKey = #{upduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updPgmId = #{updpgmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where courseNo = #{courseno,jdbcType=BIGINT}

,
from t_course_info where 1=1 and releaseFlg = '1'
